name: Sokudo Nights
description:
Sokudo Nights is an authentic, story based, street-racing game that pits you against many racing teams and solo racers throughout various hotspots in the underground Japanese racing scene. Players can modify their cars with a wide range of custom tuner parts, software, and techniques to make their car a unique beast. Players will follow the story of their own racer starting in the Gunma Prefecture[0] by creating their own crew and battling on rival crew turf. Defeat crews, unlock parts, open more locations, and travel at your own pace.






[0] Gunma is a prefecture of Japan located in the Kantō region.
